name: Keepin it reel
description:
Your days as a platforming hero are not yet past, for even though your legs might be broken, and your item were stolen, and you've been left with only a hookshot, a hookshot is all you need.

 Now hookshot your way to victory!

<>

Left-Click to fire your hookshot, and hold it down to reel yourself in.

Right-Click to release.
